posts.post_title: Misc. George Gibson cards for sale (Price Reduction)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard
Evening Folks,

   Looking to thin out my George Gibson collection over the next little while.  The following are for sale to start.  I'd also consider trades for items of Toronto from the International/Eastern League.  Scans and prices below.

Please email or post for more info.

Thanks!

Richard.

E254 Colgan Chip - $10

[IMG]http://www.moongibson.com/images/gallery/cards/E254_Gibson.jpg[/IMG]

E121 Series of 120 - SOLD

T332 Helmar Stamp - $20

[IMG]http://www.moongibson.com/images/gallery/cards/T332_Gibson.jpg[/IMG]

T330-2 Piedmont Stamp - $25

[IMG]http://www.moongibson.com/images/gallery/cards/T330-2_Gibson.jpg[/IMG]


P2 Pin Small Letters - $35

[IMG]http://www.moongibson.com/images/gallery/cards/P2_Small_Gibson.jpg[/IMG]


W555 - $40

[IMG]http://www.moongibson.com/images/gallery/cards/W555_Gibson.jpg[/IMG]


T206 Sovereign 150 - SOLD
